summary: When a town boss confiscates homesteader's supplies after gold is discovered nearby, a tough cowboy risks his life to try and get it to them.
cast: James Stewart|Arthur Kennedy|Julie Adams|Rock Hudson|Jay C. Flippen|Lori Nelson|Chubby Johnson|Stepin Fetchit|Harry Morgan|Howard Petrie|Frances Bavier|Jack Lambert|Royal Dano|Frank Chase|Cliff Lyons|Frank Ferguson|Victor Adamson|Harry Arnie|Gregg Barton|Charles Bennett|Clem Fuller|Manuel Thomas Golemis|Jack Kenny|Donald Kerr|Al Kunde|Ethan Laidlaw|Philo McCullough|Dal McKennon|Jennings Miles|Ron Myron|George North|Tex Parker|Joe Phillips|Joe Ploski|Hugh Prosser|Richard Randlett|Lillian Randolph|Cap Somers|George Sowards|George Taylor|Albertine V. West|Britt Wood
title: Horizontes lejanos
